name: hills-capital-backend
description: Backend for Hills Capital Trade Platform

scripts.db:create: node -e "const { sequelize } = require('./src/config/db.js'); sequelize.getQueryInterface().createDatabase(process.env.DB_NAME || 'hillscapitaltrade').then(() => { console.log('Database created successfully'); process.exit(0); }).catch(console.error);"
scripts.db:drop: node -e "const { sequelize } = require('./src/config/db.js'); sequelize.getQueryInterface().dropDatabase(process.env.DB_NAME || 'hillscapitaltrade').then(() => { console.log('Database dropped successfully'); process.exit(0); }).catch(console.error);"
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:drop && npm run db:create && npm run db:migrate && npm run setup
